name: The Ninth Circle
description:
For my first game jam and only my second game ever made I think this turned out alright...

THE NINTH CIRCLE

======================================================

Battle The Evil beings of hell to earn Sin coin which you can spend at the gun shop on death to unlock new, more powerful weapons and try to best the evil monstrosities once again.

This game was made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 37 and will also be entered into the Game Maker Studio 2 Beta Jam.

If you would like to follow me you can here: @zeoxo

CONTROLS

============

walk: WASD

shoot: space

Activate sign: E
